Name: NVL
About the game: NVL - an amazing adventure game in the genre of RPG. An interesting combat turn-based system as in JRPG. Beautiful anime girls with pantsu. With your faithful girl you will go to new lands. Help the people of the villages and cities. Fight shoulder to shoulder with your sexy girlfriend. Features: Turn-based combat system Beautiful and juicy anime graphics Huge world mapped Many kinds of enemies Combinations of tricks and spells Achievements! +Trading cards
